metatags.twitter:creator: @Reuters
metatags.og:description: Contrary to user claims, a photo showing people on an overhead bridge greeting soldiers on a tank is unrelated to Russia’s 2022 invasion of Ukraine. The image is over 30 years old appears in Croatian language articles tracing it to Yugoslavia in 1991.

metatags.og:title: Ukrainian troops sweep into key city of Kherson after Russian forces retreat, dealing blow to Putin | CNN
metatags.og:description: Ukrainian forces swept into the key city of Kherson on Friday as Russian troops retreated to the east, delivering a major victory to Kyiv and marking one of the biggest setbacks for President Vladimir Putin since his invasion began.
